thread.title: North Korea could release American prisoners

title: North Korea could release American prisoners
text:
North Korea could release American prisoners 11:31am BST - 02:22
The White House said on Thursday it would welcome the release of three Americans imprisoned in North Korea as a goodwill gesture before a planned summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, but that it could not confirm reports that they are about to be freed.
The White House said on Thursday it would welcome the release of three Americans imprisoned in North Korea as a goodwill gesture before a planned summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, but that it could not confirm reports that they are about to be freed. //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/05/04/north-korea-could-release-american-priso?videoId=423619657&videoChannel=13422
